analyzed: tha dad par ni 'dzin par nus pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not possible to apprehend what is different.

original: gzhan ni de'i bdag nyid kho na las 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan ni de'i bdag nyid kho na las 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But the other is the cognition of that very nature.

original: de yang ma yin te /üîΩde bdag nyid dang de bdag can //
analyzed: de yang ma yin te / de bdag nyid dang de bdag can //
translated: That is not so.üîΩThe form is not said to be

original: de bdag min par brjod ma yin //
analyzed: de bdag min par brjod ma yin //
translated: different from that nature, nor is it identical with it.

original: brgyud pas de'i bdag can yin na //
analyzed: brgyud pas de'i bdag can yin na //
translated: If it is the nature of that through a series,

original: tha mi dad pa nyid dud thal //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa nyid dud thal //
translated: then it follows that it is not different.üîΩThe form is not the nature of the cognition,

original: rnam pa gzhan @134a * //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan @134a * //
translated: because it is a different form.üîΩThe form is not the nature of the cognition, because it is a different form.

original: dang rnam pa gzhan de'i bdag nyid kyis de'i bdag can nyid yin no //
analyzed: dang rnam pa gzhan de'i bdag nyid kyis de'i bdag can nyid yin no //
translated: The cognition is not the nature of the form, because it is a different cognition.üîΩThe form is not different from the cognition, because it is not apprehended without the cognition.

original: rnam pa gzhan de rnam pa dang ldan pa dang / de'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir /üîΩde'i bdag nyid can rnam pa dang ldan pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //üîΩgal te de dang tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa mi 'dzin na /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan de rnam pa dang ldan pa dang / de'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir / de'i bdag nyid can rnam pa dang ldan pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro // gal te de dang tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa mi 'dzin na /
translated: The cognition is not different from the form, because it is not apprehended without the form.üîΩIf the cognition does not apprehend the form that is not different from it,

original: rnam pa gzhan gzung yang de las gzhan 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gzung yang de las gzhan 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then even if another form is apprehended, it would not be apprehended as different from it.

original: tha mi dad pa ni 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa ni 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
translated: The reason why the cognition is not different from the form is not because it is the cause of the apprehension of the form,

original: rnam pa dang ldan pa mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa dang ldan pa mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not apprehend the form.

original: 'on te de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir de ni rnam pa gzhan nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na //
analyzed: 'on te de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir de ni rnam pa gzhan nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na //
translated: If you say that it is not different from the form because it is not different from the form, then it is not different from the form.

original: de lta na ni 'o na rnam pa tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir rnam pa dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na rnam pa tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir rnam pa dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If you say that it is not different from the form because it is not different from the form, then it is not different from the form.

original: 'dis ni rnam par bshad pa byed pa'i tshig kyang spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni rnam par bshad pa byed pa'i tshig kyang spangs pa yin te /
translated: This also rejects the statement of the Vyakhyayukti:

original: gcig la zhig pas ni thams cad la zhig par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gcig la zhig pas ni thams cad la zhig par mi 'gyur te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe destruction of one thing does not mean the destruction of all things,

original: gsal ba gzhan la gnas par dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gsal ba gzhan la gnas par dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: because the existence of another thing is perceived.‚Äù

original: rnam pa tha dad pa med pa'i phyir de dang tha dad pa med pa ni gsal ba gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin te ;
analyzed: rnam pa tha dad pa med pa'i phyir de dang tha dad pa med pa ni gsal ba gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin te ;
translated: Because the form is not different from the form, it is not different from the form,

original: rnam pa gzhan bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan bzhin no //
translated: just like another form.

original: 'on te nag po la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa dang ldan pa ni gzhan nyid du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'on te nag po la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa dang ldan pa ni gzhan nyid du 'gyur gyi /
translated: If you say that the form is different because it is different due to the distinction of black, etc.,

original: rnam pa gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: but the form is not different,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gal te nag sogs gzhan yin na //üîΩde tha dad las dad gang //üîΩde dang 'brel phyir tha dad na //
analyzed: gal te nag sogs gzhan yin na // de tha dad las dad gang // de dang 'brel phyir tha dad na //
translated: If the color blue, etc.

original: rnam pa'ang der ni cis mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam pa'ang der ni cis mi 'gyur //
translated: is different from the cognition, how can it be different from what is different?

original: gal te nag po nyid la sogs pa rnam pa dang ldan pa las gzhan yin na /
analyzed: gal te nag po nyid la sogs pa rnam pa dang ldan pa las gzhan yin na /
translated: If the color blue, etc.

original: ci ltar de tha dad pas tha dad par 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ltar de tha dad pas tha dad par 'gyur /
translated: is different from the cognition, how can it be different from what is different?

original: gzhan tha dad pas ni gzhan tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan tha dad pas ni gzhan tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: A different thing is not different from another different thing.

original: rgyu nyid kyis tha dad par byed pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu nyid kyis tha dad par byed pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is different by reason of its cause,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no cause.

original: yon tan nyid ni rdzas kyi rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: yon tan nyid ni rdzas kyi rgyu ma yin te /
translated: The quality itself is not the cause of the substance,

original: de dang grub pa dang bde ba gcig tu skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang grub pa dang bde ba gcig tu skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is produced simultaneously with the substance and its existence.

original: rgyu nyid yin yang de las gzhan tha dad pa skyes pa'i phyir de la yang 'brel pa can tha dad par byed pa gzhan yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu nyid yin yang de las gzhan tha dad pa skyes pa'i phyir de la yang 'brel pa can tha dad par byed pa gzhan yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if it were the cause, another cause would be required to produce the difference from that, because it is produced as different from that.

original: rgyu nyid ni 'brel pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu nyid ni 'brel pa can ma yin te /
translated: The cause is not the related factor.

original: de lta ma yin na me yang du ba'i 'brel pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na me yang du ba'i 'brel pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, then fire would be related to smoke.

original: ma mthong ba'i phyir de lta ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i phyir de lta ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not so because it is not seen,

original: 'o na ni 'brel pa can yang rgyur ma mthong bas na rgyu nyid du brtag par mi bya'o //üîΩtha dad min phyogs la tha dad //üîΩce na rnam pa'ang tha dad nyid //
analyzed: 'o na ni 'brel pa can yang rgyur ma mthong bas na rgyu nyid du brtag par mi bya'o // tha dad min phyogs la tha dad // ce na rnam pa'ang tha dad nyid //
translated: then since the related is not seen as a cause, it should not be imagined as a cause.üîΩIf it is not different,üîΩthen the aspects are different.

original: tha dad las dbye med tha dad //
analyzed: tha dad las dbye med tha dad //
translated: If it is not different from the different,

original: gzhan du tha dad med mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan du tha dad med mi 'gyur //
translated: it would not be different from the other.

original: nag po la sogs pa ni rnam pa dang ldan pa @134b las tha dad pa ma yin te /üîΩdes na tha dad pa las tha mi dad pa'i gang yin pa de yang tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir rnam pa dang ldan pa tha dad do zhe na /
analyzed: nag po la sogs pa ni rnam pa dang ldan pa @134b las tha dad pa ma yin te / des na tha dad pa las tha mi dad pa'i gang yin pa de yang tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir rnam pa dang ldan pa tha dad do zhe na /
translated: Black and so on are not different from the possessor of aspects,üîΩtherefore, that which is not different from the different is also different, because it is different from the different.

original: 'o na ni rnam pa yang de dang tha mi dad pas tha dad par thal lo //
analyzed: 'o na ni rnam pa yang de dang tha mi dad pas tha dad par thal lo //
translated: If you say that the aspects are not different from it, then it follows that they are different.

original: rnam pa yang rnam pa dang ldan pa dang tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa yang rnam pa dang ldan pa dang tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: The aspects are not different from the possessor of aspects.

original: des na tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa ni rnam pa dang ldan pa gzhan dang / rnam pa las kyang tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa ni rnam pa dang ldan pa gzhan dang / rnam pa las kyang tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the difference and non-difference of the possessor of aspects and the aspects would be different from the aspects.

original: rnam pa ni tha mi dad pa nyid de /
analyzed: rnam pa ni tha mi dad pa nyid de /
translated: The aspects are not different.

original: rnam pa yon tan tu gyur pa ni nag po la sogs pa'i yon tan dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa yon tan tu gyur pa ni nag po la sogs pa'i yon tan dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: The aspect that is a quality is not related to the quality of black, etc.

original: yon rnams phan tshun mi 'du ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: yon rnams phan tshun mi 'du ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because the qualities do not combine with each other.

original: de'i yon tan rnams ni yon tan can la 'du ba yin no zhes bya ba gzhung yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i yon tan rnams ni yon tan can la 'du ba yin no zhes bya ba gzhung yin no zhe na /
translated: The qualities of that are combined with the possessor of qualities.

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: tha dad ni 'di brjod par rigs //
analyzed: tha dad ni 'di brjod par rigs //
translated: It is reasonable to say that they are different.

original: gcig pa las ni dbyer med phyir //
analyzed: gcig pa las ni dbyer med phyir //
translated: Because they are inseparable from the one.

original: 'di 'dir 'di ni ma yin zhes //
analyzed: 'di 'dir 'di ni ma yin zhes //
translated: This is not that.

original: rtogs pa tha dad las byung yin //
analyzed: rtogs pa tha dad las byung yin //
translated: The realization arises from the difference.

original: 'o na tha dad 'gyur zhe na //
analyzed: 'o na tha dad 'gyur zhe na //
translated: Well, they would be different.

original: 'di ni byis pa'i rtsed mor 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di ni byis pa'i rtsed mor 'gyur //
translated: This would be a child's play.

original: tha dad phyogs ni yongs spangs te ;
analyzed: tha dad phyogs ni yongs spangs te ;
translated: Abandoning the position of difference,

original: / phyogs gzhan la ni rten pa'i phyir //
analyzed: / phyogs gzhan la ni rten pa'i phyir //
translated: because it relies on another position,

original: der yang nyes pa mthong ba yis //
analyzed: der yang nyes pa mthong ba yis //
translated: seeing the fault there,

original: slar yang snga ma la brten phyir //
analyzed: slar yang snga ma la brten phyir //
translated: and again, because of the former, the latter.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa'i mtshan nyid kyang spyi ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa'i mtshan nyid kyang spyi ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the characteristic of the mode is not a universal.

original: 'dis ni gtso bo'i mtshan nyid kyang gsal ba yin te /üîΩde yang rjes su 'gro ba yin na /
analyzed: 'dis ni gtso bo'i mtshan nyid kyang gsal ba yin te / de yang rjes su 'gro ba yin na /
translated: By this, the characteristic of the primary existent is also clarified.

original: de'i gnas skabs thams cad 'dzin pa'i phyir thams cad thams cad mthong bar 'gyur te //
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs thams cad 'dzin pa'i phyir thams cad thams cad mthong bar 'gyur te //
translated: And if that is the case, then because it would grasp all of its states, everything would be seen in everything.

original: de kho na gzhan med pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de kho na gzhan med pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because it is not different from that.

original: gnas skabs de gtso bo'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas skabs de gtso bo'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That state is the nature of the primary existent.

original: 'on te don dam par na thams cad snang ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'on te don dam par na thams cad snang ba nyid do //
translated: But if it is the case that ultimately everything is manifest,

original: 'khrul pas mi snang ngo zhes rnam par 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'khrul pas mi snang ngo zhes rnam par 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
translated: then it is a mistake to say that it is not manifest because of delusion.

original: de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de yang mi rigs te /
translated: That is also unreasonable.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / thams cad snang ba med dam ci //
analyzed: 'di ltar / thams cad snang ba med dam ci //
translated: Is everything not manifest?

original: 'on te snang yang 'khrul pa yin //
analyzed: 'on te snang yang 'khrul pa yin //
translated: Or, although manifest, is it mistaken?

original: 'dir ni tshad ma yod min te //
analyzed: 'dir ni tshad ma yod min te //
translated: Here there is no valid cognition,

original: rtogs pa 'ba' zhig tsam du zad //üîΩthams cad rgyu las nus pa yis //
analyzed: rtogs pa 'ba' zhig tsam du zad // thams cad rgyu las nus pa yis //
translated: it is just a mere idea.üîΩEverything is by nature

original: rang bzhin du ni gnas pa gang //
analyzed: rang bzhin du ni gnas pa gang //
translated: endowed with the potential from the cause.

original: de ni gtso bo 'gro ba kun //
analyzed: de ni gtso bo 'gro ba kun //
translated: It is the principal of all beings.

original: de las skyes par gyur pa yin //üîΩgal te khyab dang rtag par ni //
analyzed: de las skyes par gyur pa yin // gal te khyab dang rtag par ni //
translated: It is that from which they are born.üîΩIf it is omnipresent and permanent,

original: gnas pa de nyid spyi yin la //üîΩgsal ba gsal ba phan tshun du //
analyzed: gnas pa de nyid spyi yin la // gsal ba gsal ba phan tshun du //
translated: it is the universal.üîΩBut the individual is seen

original: tha dad par ni mthong ba yin //
analyzed: tha dad par ni mthong ba yin //
translated: to be different from individual.

original: 'dir 'di ni 'gal ba yin te //
analyzed: 'dir 'di ni 'gal ba yin te //
translated: Here this is contradictory.

original: yon tan rnams kyi rang bzhin mchog / mthong ba'i lam du 'gro ma yin //
analyzed: yon tan rnams kyi rang bzhin mchog / mthong ba'i lam du 'gro ma yin //
translated: The supreme nature of the qualities is not on the path of seeing.

original: mthong ba'i lam du gang 'gyur te //
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam du gang 'gyur te //
translated: What is on the path of seeing

original: sgyur ma lta bur shin tu gsog / ces bya'o //
analyzed: sgyur ma lta bur shin tu gsog / ces bya'o //
translated: is like a magical creation, a complete fiction.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: @135a 'bras bu'i sgo nas brtags pa gang /üîΩde gsog nyid kyis de yang ni //üîΩgsog 'gyur rgyu la de yi ni //
analyzed: @135a 'bras bu'i sgo nas brtags pa gang / de gsog nyid kyis de yang ni // gsog 'gyur rgyu la de yi ni //
translated: whatever is imagined in terms of effectsüîΩis a fiction, and that

original: rang bzhin gyis ni yod phyir ro //üîΩci ste gzhan nyid de 'bras sngar //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni yod phyir ro // ci ste gzhan nyid de 'bras sngar //
translated: is also a fiction, because its nature exists in the cause.üîΩBut if difference is the effect,

original: yod smra ba ni nyams par 'gyur //
analyzed: yod smra ba ni nyams par 'gyur //
translated: the assertion that it exists prior to the effect is undermined.

original: gang zhig mthong ba med pa yi //üîΩdngos po de nyid don dam min //
analyzed: gang zhig mthong ba med pa yi // dngos po de nyid don dam min //
translated: That which is not seenüîΩis not reality.

original: de'i phyir gtso bo'i mtshan nyid kyang spyi ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtso bo'i mtshan nyid kyang spyi ma yin no //
translated: Therefore the definition of the principal is not a universal.

original: 'on te yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos po la mngon sum mi 'jug pa'i phyir gal te dus kyi dbye ba tha dad pa'i gsal ba khyab pa'i spyi mi 'dzin pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: 'on te yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos po la mngon sum mi 'jug pa'i phyir gal te dus kyi dbye ba tha dad pa'i gsal ba khyab pa'i spyi mi 'dzin pa de lta na yang /
translated: But if you think that because direct perception does not engage with the prior and subsequent entities, therefore it does not apprehend a universal that pervades the individual that is differentiated by time, even so,üîΩthe pervasion of simultaneous objects that are different is apprehended.

original: dus mtshungs pa yul tha dad pa'i khyab pa ni 'dzin pa nyid do snyam na de yang ma yin te ;
analyzed: dus mtshungs pa yul tha dad pa'i khyab pa ni 'dzin pa nyid do snyam na de yang ma yin te ;
translated: That is not so, because:

original: 'di ltar / dus tha dad par gyur pa yin //üîΩgsal ba khyab pa mi 'dzin na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dus tha dad par gyur pa yin // gsal ba khyab pa mi 'dzin na //
translated: They are different in time.üîΩIf the individual is not apprehended,

original: spyi la dgos pa yod min te //
analyzed: spyi la dgos pa yod min te //
translated: the universal has no purpose.

original: de 'dra'i tha snyad 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: de 'dra'i tha snyad 'gyur ma yin //
translated: That convention does not occur.

original: ra dkar pos lhag gsol cig byas pa na sngar lha gsol ba mthong ba de nyid 'di yin no //
analyzed: ra dkar pos lhag gsol cig byas pa na sngar lha gsol ba mthong ba de nyid 'di yin no //
translated: When someone says, ‚ÄúThe white goat will perform the deity worship,‚Äù one thinks, ‚ÄúThat very one who was seen performing the deity worship before is this one.‚Äù

original: snyam pas / rigs rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir lha gsol ba'i don du tha snyad pa dag gis de spyir 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: snyam pas / rigs rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir lha gsol ba'i don du tha snyad pa dag gis de spyir 'dod pa yin no //
translated: Because of following the type, the conventionalists assert that in general it is that which performs the deity worship.

original: dus gcig tu mthong ba de ni tha snyad la nye bar mkho ma yin te /
analyzed: dus gcig tu mthong ba de ni tha snyad la nye bar mkho ma yin te /
translated: Seeing it at one time is not necessary for the conventional.

original: gnyi ga yang sngar gyi rjes su 'brangs pas de'i rigs nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang sngar gyi rjes su 'brangs pas de'i rigs nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because both are understood to be of the same type as the previous one.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma dag la yang snga phyi'i gsal ba gsal bar snang ba dang / mi gsal bar snang ba'i rnam pa dag las tha dad pa'i spyi gzhan ni rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma dag la yang snga phyi'i gsal ba gsal bar snang ba dang / mi gsal bar snang ba'i rnam pa dag las tha dad pa'i spyi gzhan ni rtogs pa med do //
translated: And in the case of the prior and subsequent, there is no other universal that is grasped apart from the aspects of the manifestation of the prior and the manifestation of the nonmanifestation of the subsequent.

original: de bzhin dus mtshungs pa dag la yang gsal ba'i rnam pa gnyis las med do //
analyzed: de bzhin dus mtshungs pa dag la yang gsal ba'i rnam pa gnyis las med do //
translated: In the same way, in the case of simultaneous ones, there are no two aspects of manifestation.

original: 'o na ci ltar 'di gnyis mtshungs so zhes bya bar rtogs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar 'di gnyis mtshungs so zhes bya bar rtogs pa yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, how is it that one understands that these two are similar?

original: rtogs pa 'di ni snga phyi byung ba dag la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: rtogs pa 'di ni snga phyi byung ba dag la yang mtshungs so //
translated: This understanding is the same in the case of prior and subsequent ones.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / de la mtshungs pa'i rnam pa ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / de la mtshungs pa'i rnam pa ni //
translated: The aspect of similarity

original: mngon sum gyis mthong yod ma yin //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis mthong yod ma yin //
translated: is not seen by direct perception.

original: gsal ba dus mtshungs pa dag la'ang //
analyzed: gsal ba dus mtshungs pa dag la'ang //
translated: Even in the case of simultaneous manifestations,

original: mngon sum gyis ni mthong ba med //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni mthong ba med //
translated: direct perception does not see them.

original: spyi zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: spyi zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúuniversal‚Äù is a remainder.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma'i gsal ba de bzhin du dus mtshungs pa dag la yang rnam pa mtshungs pa nyid tha dad par rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma'i gsal ba de bzhin du dus mtshungs pa dag la yang rnam pa mtshungs pa nyid tha dad par rtogs pa med do //
translated: Just as the former and latter manifestations are the same, so too, with respect to those that are simultaneous, there is no apprehension of their being different.

original: de ni rtogs pa tsam 'ba' zhig tu zad de rtogs par bya ba mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rtogs pa tsam 'ba' zhig tu zad de rtogs par bya ba mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That is just mere apprehension, because the object of apprehension is not seen.

original: rtogs par bya ba'i rnam pa med par ni rtogs pa 'ga' yang rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba'i rnam pa med par ni rtogs pa 'ga' yang rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: Without the aspect of the object of apprehension, no apprehension whatsoever apprehends.

original: mtshungs pa'i rnam par rtogs pa gang //
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i rnam par rtogs pa gang //
translated: What is the apprehension of sameness?

original: de ni dmigs pa med par skye //
analyzed: de ni dmigs pa med par skye //
translated: It arises without an objective referent.

original: de yi gzung ba snang med phyir //
analyzed: de yi gzung ba snang med phyir //
translated: Because the appearance of its object does not exist,

original: sngon @135b dang phyi ma'i khyad par bzhin //
analyzed: sngon @135b dang phyi ma'i khyad par bzhin //
translated: like the difference between former and latter.

original: gang mtshungs pa'i rtogs pa de thams cad ni dmigs pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: gang mtshungs pa'i rtogs pa de thams cad ni dmigs pa med pa yin te /
translated: Any apprehension of sameness is without an objective referent,

original: de la gzung ba mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la gzung ba mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the appearance of the object does not exist.

original: dper na dus tha dad pa'i gsal ba'i spyi la dmigs par 'dod pa bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na dus tha dad pa'i gsal ba'i spyi la dmigs par 'dod pa bzhin te /
translated: For example, it is like the desire to observe the generality of a manifestation at a different time.

original: gsal ba dus mtshungs pa'i spyi'i yul can gyi rtogs pa yang /
analyzed: gsal ba dus mtshungs pa'i spyi'i yul can gyi rtogs pa yang /
translated: The apprehension of the generality of a simultaneous manifestation

original: spyi'i rnam pa snang ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: spyi'i rnam pa snang ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gtan tshigs so //
translated: The general aspect is not a real entity. This is the logical reason.

original: 'o na thams cad mi 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir spyi med na shes pa de ci ltar skye zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na thams cad mi 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir spyi med na shes pa de ci ltar skye zhe na /
translated: If there is no universal, how can that cognition arise, since all things are different?

original: de yang mi bden te /
analyzed: de yang mi bden te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: gal te rtogs pa 'di dag ni //
analyzed: gal te rtogs pa 'di dag ni //
translated: If these conceptual thoughts

original: 'ga' zhig gnyid la 'jug na yang //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gnyid la 'jug na yang //
translated: occur even when one is asleep,

original: rgyu tsam nyid la nges 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: rgyu tsam nyid la nges 'gyur gyi //
translated: then the cognition of a universal is certain to be a mere cause,

original: spyi rtogs par bo  ci ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: spyi rtogs par bo  ci ltar 'gyur //
translated: but how can a universal be cognized?

original: rgyu med par nges pa ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu tsam zhig brtag pa nyid du rigs kyi spyi la go cir 'gyur /
analyzed: rgyu med par nges pa ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu tsam zhig brtag pa nyid du rigs kyi spyi la go cir 'gyur /
translated: Since it is not certain that there is no cause, it is reasonable to suspect that it is a mere cause, but what is the universal?

original: yang na de las gzhan pa dag las ldog pa tsam nyid spyir 'gyur ba'i phyir chad pa ci yod /
analyzed: yang na de las gzhan pa dag las ldog pa tsam nyid spyir 'gyur ba'i phyir chad pa ci yod /
translated: Or, since the mere exclusion from other things is a universal, what is the nihilism?

original: de yang ngo bo med pa yin no zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: de yang ngo bo med pa yin no zhes bstan zin to //
translated: And that is also shown to be essenceless.üîΩMoreover:

original: gzhan yang / bag chags sa bon sad pa las //
analyzed: gzhan yang / bag chags sa bon sad pa las //
translated: From the activation of the seed of latent propensities,

original: sgro 'dogs pa yi rnam pa gang //
analyzed: sgro 'dogs pa yi rnam pa gang //
translated: what is the form of reification?

original: de tsam gyis ni chog pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de tsam gyis ni chog pa'i phyir //
translated: Since that is sufficient,

original: spyi gzhan ci ltar don med min //
analyzed: spyi gzhan ci ltar don med min //
translated: How can the general be meaningless?

original: tha snyad pa tsam de kho na nyid du ma brtags pa yang rigs su 'grub pa'i phyir gzhan du ngal ba lhur len pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /üîΩgal te chos dang chos min pa //
analyzed: tha snyad pa tsam de kho na nyid du ma brtags pa yang rigs su 'grub pa'i phyir gzhan du ngal ba lhur len pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya / gal te chos dang chos min pa //
translated: Since it is established as a category merely in conventional usage, without being examined in terms of reality, why should one exert oneself in other ways?üîΩIf the reason is established

original: grub phyir rigs ni don dam na //
analyzed: grub phyir rigs ni don dam na //
translated: in order to establish virtue and vice,

original: de yi chos kyis sgrub byed nyid //
analyzed: de yi chos kyis sgrub byed nyid //
translated: then it is established by its property;

original: tshad ma'ang gang gis 'jal ba yin //
analyzed: tshad ma'ang gang gis 'jal ba yin //
translated: but by what is the valid cognition measured?

original: rigs rang gi ngo bor grub par gyur kyang chos la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rigs rang gi ngo bor grub par gyur kyang chos la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa nyid ni /
translated: Even if the reason is established in its own nature, its property of being a proof

original: bye brag tu khong du chud pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bye brag tu khong du chud pa ma yin te /
translated: is not understood in particular,

original: rigs gzhan las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs gzhan las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not different from another reason.

original: de bzhin du grub pa ma yin na ni 'bras bu la nye bar mkho ba ma yin pa'i phyir rigs 'dzin pa don med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du grub pa ma yin na ni 'bras bu la nye bar mkho ba ma yin pa'i phyir rigs 'dzin pa don med do //
translated: Similarly, if it is not established, then it is pointless to apprehend the reason, because it is not required for the result.

original: yang na de lta bu'i rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis nye bar mtshon pa'i gsal ba nyid chos la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin pas de nyid spyi yin no //
analyzed: yang na de lta bu'i rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis nye bar mtshon pa'i gsal ba nyid chos la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin pas de nyid spyi yin no //
translated: Or else, the clarity that is indicated by such a special cognition is itself the universal that is the basis of the term ‚Äúproperty‚Äù and so on.

original: 'on te gal te rtag pa dang khyab pa'i spyi med na spyi'i rnam pa can gyi rtog pa khyab pa nyid med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gal te rtag pa dang khyab pa'i spyi med na spyi'i rnam pa can gyi rtog pa khyab pa nyid med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if there is no permanent, pervasive universal, then the cognition that has the aspect of a universal would be nonpervasive.

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is illogical.

original: rtogs pa de la rgyu 'ga' zhig //
analyzed: rtogs pa de la rgyu 'ga' zhig //
translated: The cause of that cognition

original: yod do zhes ni rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: yod do zhes ni rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: is said to exist.

original: gzhan bya'i rnam pa yod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan bya'i rnam pa yod pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the aspect of another exists,

original: gzhan bya yongs su rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: gzhan bya yongs su rtogs pa yin //
translated: the cognition of another is cognized.

original: spyi'i rnam pa'i gzhan la bya ni nyams su myong bar med do //
analyzed: spyi'i rnam pa'i gzhan la bya ni nyams su myong bar med do //
translated: The aspect of a universal is not experienced in another.

original: de ltar @136a * //
analyzed: de ltar @136a * //
translated: In that case,

original: yang sngar bstan pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang sngar bstan pa nyid do //
translated: it is just as was previously explained.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi myong ba med pa'i phyir spyi ni med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi myong ba med pa'i phyir spyi ni med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, because there is no experience of a universal by direct perception, a universal does not exist.

original: snang ba'i rang bzhin pa yang de las gzhan thun mong ba nyid du nyams su myong ba med pas spyi med do //
analyzed: snang ba'i rang bzhin pa yang de las gzhan thun mong ba nyid du nyams su myong ba med pas spyi med do //
translated: Also, the nature of the appearance is not experienced as something else, as a generality, so there is no generality.

original: gal te spyi gsal ba gcig gis mthar thug pa'i phyir zhes bya ba chos can gyi spyi med pa'i phyir khyod la chos can ma grub pas na /
analyzed: gal te spyi gsal ba gcig gis mthar thug pa'i phyir zhes bya ba chos can gyi spyi med pa'i phyir khyod la chos can ma grub pas na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúThe subject is not established for you because the generality of the subject is not established, since the subject is limited to a single instance of the particular,‚Äù

original: gzhi ma grub pa nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gzhi ma grub pa nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: then are you not guilty of having a subject that is not established?

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: 'di ni thal ba sgrub byed pa //
analyzed: 'di ni thal ba sgrub byed pa //
translated: This is a reductio argument.

original: des na gzhi ma grub nyid min //
analyzed: des na gzhi ma grub nyid min //
translated: Therefore, it is not that the subject is not established.

original: gal te 'di 'gyur 'dir yang der //
analyzed: gal te 'di 'gyur 'dir yang der //
translated: If this is so, then that is so.

original: min na gnyi ga'ang zhes 'dod 'dir //
analyzed: min na gnyi ga'ang zhes 'dod 'dir //
translated: If this is not so, then both are so.

original: gal te de ltar gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa yin na /
translated: If it is so that the subject is limited to a single instance of the particular,

original: de'i tshe yul gyi khyab pa dang ldan pa gzhan dang 'brel par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe yul gyi khyab pa dang ldan pa gzhan dang 'brel par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then it is not related to another that pervades the object.

original: ma yin na ni gnyi ga yang zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma yin na ni gnyi ga yang zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not so, then both are so.

original: gal te gzhan dang ldan pa gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te gzhan dang ldan pa gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
translated: If it were not so, then the universal would not be present in the final particular.

original: gsal ba gcig la gnas pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba gcig la gnas pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not present in a single particular,

original: gsal ba thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is present in all particulars.

original: spyi ni gsal ba gcig nyid la gnas par 'dod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: spyi ni gsal ba gcig nyid la gnas par 'dod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is not maintained that the universal is present in a single particular.

original: skyon 'di med de //
analyzed: skyon 'di med de //
translated: This fault does not exist,

original: de ni thun mong nyid yin na //
analyzed: de ni thun mong nyid yin na //
translated: because it is common to all.

original: khyab pa mngon sum gyis rig 'gyur //üîΩde yi ngo bo gzhan gyis ni //
analyzed: khyab pa mngon sum gyis rig 'gyur // de yi ngo bo gzhan gyis ni //
translated: The pervasion is known by perception.üîΩThe nature of that is not

original: ngo bo 'dzin pa ma 'khrul min //
analyzed: ngo bo 'dzin pa ma 'khrul min //
translated: misapprehended by another nature.

original: gal te spyi khyab pa yin na //
analyzed: gal te spyi khyab pa yin na //
translated: If the universal is pervasive,

original: mngon sum gyi tshad mas khyab pa nyid du 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi tshad mas khyab pa nyid du 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it is apprehended as pervasive by the valid cognition of perception.

original: phyin ci log tu 'dzin pa ni tshad ma nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu 'dzin pa ni tshad ma nyid ma yin no //
translated: But if it is apprehended in a distorted way, then it is not a valid cognition.

original: gal te khyab pa nyid du rtogs na ni //
analyzed: gal te khyab pa nyid du rtogs na ni //
translated: If it is understood to be pervasive,

original: gsal ba mtha' dag rtogs pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gsal ba mtha' dag rtogs pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: then it would be understood in all particulars.

original: khyab par bya ba ma bzung bar khyab par byed pa nyid du mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab par bya ba ma bzung bar khyab par byed pa nyid du mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the pervader is not apprehended without apprehending the pervaded.

original: rtogs pa yang med do //
analyzed: rtogs pa yang med do //
translated: And there is no apprehension of the pervader.

original: des na de lta bu'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de lta bu'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not of that nature.

original: des na spyi nyid med pa'i phyir chos gnyi ga ldog go //
analyzed: des na spyi nyid med pa'i phyir chos gnyi ga ldog go //
translated: Therefore, because of the non-existence of the universal itself, both properties are excluded.

original: gal te 'di gnas pa'i phyogs yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'di gnas pa'i phyogs yin na ni /
translated: If this is the position,

original: chos can ma grub pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos can ma grub pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: then there is the fault of the non-establishment of the property-possessor.

original: 'di ni phan tshun 'gal ba ston pa lhur byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni phan tshun 'gal ba ston pa lhur byed pa yin no //
translated: This is the main point of teaching mutual contradiction.

original: kho bo cag de lta bu'i don sgrub par ni mi nus te /
analyzed: kho bo cag de lta bu'i don sgrub par ni mi nus te /
translated: We are not able to establish such a meaning,

original: de lta bur 'gyur ba gzhan ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bur 'gyur ba gzhan ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because we do not see any other way of doing it.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni dpe med par 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni dpe med par 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: Inference does not operate without an example.

original: 'on te spyi ni gzhan du mi 'thad pas rtogs par bya ba /
analyzed: 'on te spyi ni gzhan du mi 'thad pas rtogs par bya ba /
translated: But if the universal is not tenable in any other way, then what is to be understood

original: don thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin te /
analyzed: don thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin te /
translated: is that it is incompatible with all meanings.

original: de la ni gzhan gyi @136b chos 'gal bas 'gal ba brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de la ni gzhan gyi @136b chos 'gal bas 'gal ba brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: And in that case, it is not to be stated as a contradiction by the contradiction of another property.

original: gzhan gyi chos ni gzhan dang 'brel pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi chos ni gzhan dang 'brel pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the property of another is not related to another.

original: lus can gyi dngos po'i chos lus can ma yin pa'i spyi la sbyor bar mi bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: lus can gyi dngos po'i chos lus can ma yin pa'i spyi la sbyor bar mi bya'o zhe na /
translated: The property of a physical thing is not applied to a nonphysical universal.üîΩThat is not so.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: Because:

original: 'di ltar // tha ma'i khyad par lus min yang //
analyzed: 'di ltar // tha ma'i khyad par lus min yang //
translated: Even though the final distinction is not physical,

original: khyab par pha rol 'dod ma yin ;
analyzed: khyab par pha rol 'dod ma yin ;
translated: it is not accepted to pervade the other.

original: / de bzhin spyi yang khyab par ni //
analyzed: / de bzhin spyi yang khyab par ni //
translated: In the same way, you should understand that a universal

original: 'gyur ba min par gzung bar gyis //
analyzed: 'gyur ba min par gzung bar gyis //
translated: is not grasped as pervading.

original: lus can ma yin pa dang 'brel pa'i tha ma'i khyad par gang yin pa de yang so sor nges pa'i rten can yin gyi /
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa dang 'brel pa'i tha ma'i khyad par gang yin pa de yang so sor nges pa'i rten can yin gyi /
translated: Even though the final distinction that is related to a nonphysical thing is based on each individual,

original: khyab par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: khyab par ni ma yin no //
translated: it does not pervade.

original: de bzhin du spyi yang lus can ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du spyi yang lus can ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: In the same way, because a universal is nonphysical,

original: khyab pa ma yin pa las 'da' bar ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyab pa ma yin pa las 'da' bar ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it does not transcend being nonpervasive.

original: 'on te khyad par de ni lus can ma yin yang /
analyzed: 'on te khyad par de ni lus can ma yin yang /
translated: But if you say that distinction, even though it is nonphysical,üîΩis not pervasive because of that,

original: de nyid kyi phyir khyab pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir khyab pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then:

original: 'o na ni rnam par dbye ba 'di lus can dang cig shos kyis byas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na ni rnam par dbye ba 'di lus can dang cig shos kyis byas pa ma yin te /
translated: But this distinction is not made on the basis of the body and something else.

original: khyab pa dang cig shos kyi rgyu mtshan ni spyi dang khyad par gyi ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: khyab pa dang cig shos kyi rgyu mtshan ni spyi dang khyad par gyi ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: The reason for the pervasion and something else is the nature of the universal and the particular.

original: yin mod ci skyon zhe na /
analyzed: yin mod ci skyon zhe na /
translated: What is wrong with that?

original: ma grub pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: ma grub pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it unestablished?

original: spyi ni khyed kyis kyang chos can nyid du nye bar blangs pa'i phyir grub pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: spyi ni khyed kyis kyang chos can nyid du nye bar blangs pa'i phyir grub pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Since you accept the universal itself as the basis, isn‚Äôt it established?üîΩThat is not so.

original: de ni ma yin te /üîΩ'di ltar / khyab pa nyid ni ma bzung bar //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te / 'di ltar / khyab pa nyid ni ma bzung bar //
translated: Thus:üîΩHow can the universal be apprehended

original: ci ltar spyi ni gzung bar brjod //
analyzed: ci ltar spyi ni gzung bar brjod //
translated: without apprehending the pervasion?

original: gal te de ni rang ngo bos //
analyzed: gal te de ni rang ngo bos //
translated: If it is apprehended by its own nature,

original: gzung na de phyir ci ltar spyi //
analyzed: gzung na de phyir ci ltar spyi //
translated: then how is it a universal?

original: gzung zhes bya ba tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gzung zhes bya ba tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder of the sentence is ‚Äúapprehended.‚Äù

original: spyi rang gi ngo bos gzung na khyab pa nyid dam cig shos su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyi rang gi ngo bos gzung na khyab pa nyid dam cig shos su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the universal is apprehended by its own nature, it would be apprehended as the pervasion or something else.

original: khyab pa nyid du 'dzin to zhe na /
analyzed: khyab pa nyid du 'dzin to zhe na /
translated: If it is apprehended as the pervasion,

original: de gsal ba mtha' dag la khyab pa'i spyi la 'jug pa gang yin pa de tsam gyis 'jug pa ni mngon sum la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de gsal ba mtha' dag la khyab pa'i spyi la 'jug pa gang yin pa de tsam gyis 'jug pa ni mngon sum la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But the mere fact that it is a universal that pervades all instances of clarity does not make it perceptible.

original: 'on te gsal ba dag du ni mi 'dzin to zhe na ;
analyzed: 'on te gsal ba dag du ni mi 'dzin to zhe na ;
translated: But if you say that it is not perceived in the individual instances,

original: de lta na 'o na spyi gsal ba gcig dang 'brel pa gzung ba ni ci ltar khyab pa nyid du 'dzin pa yin /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na spyi gsal ba gcig dang 'brel pa gzung ba ni ci ltar khyab pa nyid du 'dzin pa yin /
translated: then how can you perceive a universal that is related to a single instance?

original: gsal ba gcig gi khyad par can nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: gsal ba gcig gi khyad par can nyid yin na ni /
translated: If it is qualified by a single instance,

original: gsal ba de'i khyad par can yin pas khyad par bzhin du spyi ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsal ba de'i khyad par can yin pas khyad par bzhin du spyi ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: then, being qualified by that instance, it is not a universal, just like the instance itself.

original: 'on te rnam grangs gzhan gyis gsal ba gzhan gyi khyad par du yang 'dzin to zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rnam grangs gzhan gyis gsal ba gzhan gyi khyad par du yang 'dzin to zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is perceived as qualified by another instance,

original: de lta yin na spyi de nyid 'di yin no zhes ci ltar rtogs /
analyzed: de lta yin na spyi de nyid 'di yin no zhes ci ltar rtogs /
translated: then how can you ascertain that it is that very same universal?

original: de nyid 'di yin no zhes mngon sum gyis ni mi rtogs so zhes dpyad zin to //
analyzed: de nyid 'di yin no zhes mngon sum gyis ni mi rtogs so zhes dpyad zin to //
translated: We have already analyzed how it is not ascertained by perception that it is that very same universal.

original: de'i phyir spyi rang bzhin ma grub pa nyid ji ltar khyab pa nyid sgrub par byed /
analyzed: de'i phyir spyi rang bzhin ma grub pa nyid ji ltar khyab pa nyid sgrub par byed /
translated: Therefore, how can a universal that is not established by nature itself be established as a pervader?

original: de'i phyir lus can min las dang / spyi las gang @137a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir lus can min las dang / spyi las gang @137a * //
translated: Therefore, it is not established that the universal is in every place,

original: du 'ang khyab mi grub //
analyzed: du 'ang khyab mi grub //
translated: nor that it is not a body.

original: mngon sum gyis kyang mthong med phyir //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis kyang mthong med phyir //
translated: And because it is not seen by direct perception,

original: spyi ni stong pa nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: spyi ni stong pa nyid du 'gyur //
translated: the universal would be empty.

original: gal te spyi ma grub na ci ltar khyed kyis spyi'i yul khyab pa yin par sgrub chos can nyid nye bar len na ni de la chos 'ga' zhig sgrub par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te spyi ma grub na ci ltar khyed kyis spyi'i yul khyab pa yin par sgrub chos can nyid nye bar len na ni de la chos 'ga' zhig sgrub par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If the universal is not established, how can you establish that the universal is the object of pervasion? If you take the subject itself, then you would establish some property.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhe na /üîΩde ni ma yin te de ltar /
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhe na / de ni ma yin te de ltar /
translated: But not otherwise.

original: 'di ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di ni bshad zin to //
translated: That is not so. It has been explained like this:

original: 'di ni thal ba sgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni thal ba sgrub pa yin te /
translated: This is an argument by reductio.

original: 'di rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs ni ma yin no //
translated: This is not the fundamental reason.

original: khyod dag la zhes gsungs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: khyod dag la zhes gsungs pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is said ‚Äúfor you,‚Äù

original: 'dir byas pas der yang 'gyur ba'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: 'dir byas pas der yang 'gyur ba'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: there is no fault because it is made here and it is also made there.

original: de nyid du ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid du ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not so in reality?

original: der byas sam 'dir yang blang ste /
analyzed: der byas sam 'dir yang blang ste /
translated: It is made there or it is taken here.

original: 'gal ba ci yod /
analyzed: 'gal ba ci yod /
translated: What contradiction is there?

original: 'dir byas pa la ni dgos pa yod pa yang yin te /
analyzed: 'dir byas pa la ni dgos pa yod pa yang yin te /
translated: Here, where it is made, there is a purpose.

original: 'di ltar / rtogs sogs kyis byas gtan tshigs 'ga' //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rtogs sogs kyis byas gtan tshigs 'ga' //
translated: No reason is made by the imagination, etc.

original: rang gi don du rtogs mi byed //üîΩsu yang bdag nyid mngon 'dod las //
analyzed: rang gi don du rtogs mi byed // su yang bdag nyid mngon 'dod las //
translated: For the sake of one‚Äôs own purpose,üîΩAnd who is there who would deceive himself,

original: slu bar byed pa yod dam ci //
analyzed: slu bar byed pa yod dam ci //
translated: Who desires his own self?

original: gzhan yang gzhan gyi don nyid la mchog tu 'bad par bya ba yin no zhes bdag nyid chen po 'di nyid la cher 'bad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir 'dir yang don smos so //
analyzed: gzhan yang gzhan gyi don nyid la mchog tu 'bad par bya ba yin no zhes bdag nyid chen po 'di nyid la cher 'bad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir 'dir yang don smos so //
translated: Moreover, it is for the sake of others that one should strive to the utmost. In order to demonstrate that this is the very thing that the Great Being strives for, the author here mentions the meaning.

original: don dam par ni rtog pas sgro btags pa'i gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid do //üîΩ'di ltar / rtog dang lung ngag byed pa po'i //
analyzed: don dam par ni rtog pas sgro btags pa'i gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid do // 'di ltar / rtog dang lung ngag byed pa po'i //
translated: But in the ultimate sense, the reason is not ascertained, because it is imagined by the imagination.üîΩThus:üîΩThe imagination is connected with the mere desire of the one who imagines,

original: 'dod pa tsam dang rjes 'brel dang // dngos las gzhan du 'gyur ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'dod pa tsam dang rjes 'brel dang // dngos las gzhan du 'gyur ba'i phyir //
translated: And with the statement, and it is different from the thing,

original: brtags pa dag ni 'khrul pa yin //
analyzed: brtags pa dag ni 'khrul pa yin //
translated: Therefore, the imagination is a mistake.

original: rtog pas sgro btags pa ni bsgrub bya'i dngos po dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtog pas sgro btags pa ni bsgrub bya'i dngos po dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: What is imagined by the imagination is not connected with the thing to be established,

original: bag chags tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bag chags tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is connected with mere habit-energy.

original: gal te de lta na ma 'brel pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na ma 'brel pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not a logical reason because it is not related,

original: 'brel pa ni 'di nyid kyis 'phen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa ni 'di nyid kyis 'phen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: we reply that it is related, because it is implied by the very statement of the reason.

original: gang du yang 'brel pa dngos su bstan pa ni med do //
analyzed: gang du yang 'brel pa dngos su bstan pa ni med do //
translated: Nowhere is the relation actually stated.

original: des na don smos so //
analyzed: des na don smos so //
translated: Therefore, the meaning is stated.

original: phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs las gang yang rung ba nyid ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag las gcig la nges pa ma yin te /üîΩgang dang gang phyogs su byas pa de la ltos te /
analyzed: phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs las gang yang rung ba nyid ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag las gcig la nges pa ma yin te / gang dang gang phyogs su byas pa de la ltos te /
translated: The reason is not ascertained as being only in things that are similar to the subject, because it is not ascertained as being only in permanent or impermanent things.üîΩFor, whatever is taken as the subject,

original: de dang der 'pho ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang der 'pho ba'i phyir ro //
translated: in relation to that, the reason is transferred to that.

original: 'di 'dra bas ni dngos por 'grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di 'dra bas ni dngos por 'grub pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not established as a thing by such a reason,

original: brjod par 'dod pa gzhan du 'gyur na gzhan sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa gzhan du 'gyur na gzhan sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is established as something else, which is different from what is desired to be expressed.

original: gal te phyogs ni bsgrub bya yin pa de la ltos nas gzhan ni phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir de la phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs @137b gang yang rung ba nyid ces bya ba'i chos de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te phyogs ni bsgrub bya yin pa de la ltos nas gzhan ni phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir de la phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs @137b gang yang rung ba nyid ces bya ba'i chos de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa ma yin nam /
translated: If the position is the predicate of the probandum, then in dependence on that, the other is not a position, so how could it be the case that any of the positions that are concordant with the position are the opposite of the discordant position?

original: des na ci ltar gtan tshigs ma yin phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs dag la nges pa'i chos ni bsgrub bya la 'khrul pa mi srid do zhe na /
analyzed: des na ci ltar gtan tshigs ma yin phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs dag la nges pa'i chos ni bsgrub bya la 'khrul pa mi srid do zhe na /
translated: In that case, how could it be that the property that is ascertained in the positions that are concordant with the position is not a logical possibility for the predicate of the probandum?

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.üîΩIn this way:

original: 'di ltar / phyogs dang mthun phyogs dngos po la //
analyzed: 'di ltar / phyogs dang mthun phyogs dngos po la //
translated: The property of the position and the property of the concordant position

original: 'gar yang nges pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'gar yang nges pa yod ma yin //
translated: are never ascertained in any way.

original: mi rtag nyid tsam phyogs min te //
analyzed: mi rtag nyid tsam phyogs min te //
translated: Mere impermanence is not the position

original: gzhan pa dag kyang srid phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan pa dag kyang srid phyir ro //
translated: because the other is a possibility.

original: gal te phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs dag las gang yang rung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don /
analyzed: gal te phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs dag las gang yang rung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don /
translated: If the meaning of ‚Äúany of the positions that are concordant with the position‚Äù is

original: sgra dang bum pa'i mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi la mi 'khrul pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di yin na ni /
analyzed: sgra dang bum pa'i mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi la mi 'khrul pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di yin na ni /
translated: because it possesses the property of non-erroneance with regard to the universals of sound and impermanence of pot.

original: de'i tshe chos de byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kho na ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe chos de byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kho na ste /
translated: If that is so, then that property is the characteristic of being produced, etc.

original: mi 'khrul pa'i chos de nyid gang yang rung ba'i sgra bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'khrul pa'i chos de nyid gang yang rung ba'i sgra bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that very property of non-erroneance is taught by the word ‚Äúany.‚Äù

original: mi 'khrul pa'i chos de ni byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: mi 'khrul pa'i chos de ni byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kho na'o //
translated: That property of non-erroneance is the characteristic of being produced, etc.

original: de lta yin na ni gtan tshigs de dngos po nyid yin gyi brtags pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin na ni gtan tshigs de dngos po nyid yin gyi brtags pa ni ma yin no //
translated: If that is so, then that reason is a real entity, not an imagined one.

original: 'on te brjod par 'dod pa las phyogs byas pa nyid yin na de ni mi rung ste /üîΩgal te mi rtag pa nyid du brjod par 'dod pas phyogs yin pa de lta na yang de tsam gyis mi rtag pa nyid du mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: 'on te brjod par 'dod pa las phyogs byas pa nyid yin na de ni mi rung ste / gal te mi rtag pa nyid du brjod par 'dod pas phyogs yin pa de lta na yang de tsam gyis mi rtag pa nyid du mi 'grub ste /
translated: But if the position is that the property to be established is being produced, that is not correct.üîΩIf the position is that it is impermanence that is to be established because it is desired to be expressed, then even so, impermanence is not established by that alone.

original: rtag pa nyid kyis brjod par 'dod pa ni de nyid kyi tshe med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyis brjod par 'dod pa ni de nyid kyi tshe med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because at that time, permanence, which is desired to be expressed, would not exist.

original: gal te dngos po la mi rtag pa nyid kyis phyogs su 'grub na grub pa la sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te dngos po la mi rtag pa nyid kyis phyogs su 'grub na grub pa la sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If a thing were established by impermanence, then that which is already established would have to be established again.

original: de'i phyir brtags pa'i chos ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir brtags pa'i chos ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, a fabricated phenomenon is not a proof.

original: rang la grub pa'i don gyi sgrub par byed pa de yang tshul gsum pa nyid kyi rtags nyid yin te /
analyzed: rang la grub pa'i don gyi sgrub par byed pa de yang tshul gsum pa nyid kyi rtags nyid yin te /
translated: And that proof of an object that is established for oneself is a reason that has the three modes.

original: des na tshul gsum pa'i rtags ston pa ni gzhan gyi rjes su dpag pa yin no //
analyzed: des na tshul gsum pa'i rtags ston pa ni gzhan gyi rjes su dpag pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the teaching of a reason that has the three modes is an inference for others.

original: des na gang dag gis phyogs gal te spyi khyab pa khas len na /
analyzed: des na gang dag gis phyogs gal te spyi khyab pa khas len na /
translated: Therefore, if one accepts a universal that pervades a part,

original: de mngon sum dang de la sogs pa'i tshad mas sgrub dgos te /
analyzed: de mngon sum dang de la sogs pa'i tshad mas sgrub dgos te /
translated: then one must prove it by means of a valid cognition such as direct perception.

original: khas len pa ni tshad ma'i rgyu mtshan can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khas len pa ni tshad ma'i rgyu mtshan can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because an assertion must be based on a valid cognition.

original: yul dang dus rnam par 'chad pa'i gsal ba gcig dang 'dre bas rnam par ma bcad pa'i rang bzhin gzhan dang bral bar rtogs pas ci ltar de khyab pa yin zhes khas blangs par rigs /
analyzed: yul dang dus rnam par 'chad pa'i gsal ba gcig dang 'dre bas rnam par ma bcad pa'i rang bzhin gzhan dang bral bar rtogs pas ci ltar de khyab pa yin zhes khas blangs par rigs /
translated: It is reasonable to ask, ‚ÄúHow can that which is understood to be devoid of another nature that is not excluded by the connection with a single manifestation that is divided in terms of place and time be a universal?‚Äù

original: mngon sum gyi dngos po du ma bzung na yang /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi dngos po du ma bzung na yang /
translated: Even though many directly perceived things are apprehended,

original: de las tha dad pa 'am gzhan rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las tha dad pa 'am gzhan rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: a different thing, that is, a universal, is not perceived.

original: ma rtogs pa ni khas blangs par mi rigs @138a * //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa ni khas blangs par mi rigs @138a * //
translated: It is not reasonable to accept what is not perceived.

original: so ; / gal te dmigs pa'i rnam pa nyid spyi yin no zhe na /
analyzed: so ; / gal te dmigs pa'i rnam pa nyid spyi yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the aspect itself is the universal,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: rnam pa la ni khyab pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa la ni khyab pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the aspect is not all-pervasive.

original: khyab pa nyid du dmigs na ni //
analyzed: khyab pa nyid du dmigs na ni //
translated: If it is perceived as all-pervasive,

original: gsal ba mtha' dag dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsal ba mtha' dag dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then all instances would be perceived.

original: de lta yin dang / yul dang dus tha dad pa'i gsal ba mtha' dag rtogs par thal ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin dang / yul dang dus tha dad pa'i gsal ba mtha' dag rtogs par thal ba yin no //
translated: If that were so, then it would follow that all instances in different places and times would be perceived.

original: rnam pa gsal pa gcig gi mthar thug pa nyid la ma khyab par grub na ni chos can ma grub pa yang spangs pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa gsal pa gcig gi mthar thug pa nyid la ma khyab par grub na ni chos can ma grub pa yang spangs pa nyid do //
translated: If it is established that the aspect of one instance is not all-pervasive, then the subject is also refuted.

original: 'o na ci ltar 'di thal ba sgrub pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar 'di thal ba sgrub pa yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, how is this a proof by reductio?

original: pha rol pos rnam pa nyid spyi yin par khas blangs shing /
analyzed: pha rol pos rnam pa nyid spyi yin par khas blangs shing /
translated: The opponent accepts that the aspect itself is the universal.

original: yang na khyab pa'i phyir thal ba sgrub pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang na khyab pa'i phyir thal ba sgrub pa nyid do //
translated: Or, because it is all-pervasive, it is a proof by reductio.

original: yang na khyab pa'i phyir gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa nyid du dmigs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba thal pa'i don yin la /
analyzed: yang na khyab pa'i phyir gsal ba gcig gi mthar thug pa nyid du dmigs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba thal pa'i don yin la /
translated: Or else, because of the pervasion, the final end of one manifestation would not be observed.

original: bzlog pa ni rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: bzlog pa ni rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: The opposite is the basic reason.

original: thal ba ni /
analyzed: thal ba ni /
translated: The reductio is

original: rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa sgrub pa'i don nyid do //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa sgrub pa'i don nyid do //
translated: merely for the purpose of establishing the pervasion of the basic reason.

original: gzhan dag ni rang bzhin gzhan dang bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs yin la /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni rang bzhin gzhan dang bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs yin la /
translated: Others say that ‚Äúbecause of being devoid of another nature‚Äù is the basic reason,

original: thal ba ni de rtogs par bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: thal ba ni de rtogs par bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: and the reductio is merely for the purpose of understanding that.

original: 'di nye bar bkod pa yang rtsa ba'i mthar thug par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nye bar bkod pa yang rtsa ba'i mthar thug par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is also set forth in order to show the final end of the basic reason.

original: bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ni med pa dgag pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
analyzed: bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ni med pa dgag pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
translated: The reason ‚Äúbecause of being devoid‚Äù is a nonimplicative negation.

original: de ni spyi dngos po med pa yin na yang grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ni spyi dngos po med pa yin na yang grub pa nyid do //
translated: And that is a nonentity, a universal, and it is established.

original: gtan tshigs dngos po med pa la ni dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi chos can khas blang bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs dngos po med pa la ni dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi chos can khas blang bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: But a nonentity cannot be accepted as the subject that has the nature of an entity.

original: de dag med na de med ces //
analyzed: de dag med na de med ces //
translated: If it does not exist, it does not exist.

original: brjod pa las kyang de rtogs phyir //
analyzed: brjod pa las kyang de rtogs phyir //
translated: Because it is understood from the statement,

original: zhes so // de ni ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: zhes so // de ni ma yin pa nyid de /
translated: That is not so.

original: gal te spyi ni chos can na //
analyzed: gal te spyi ni chos can na //
translated: If the universal is the subject,

original: de la khyab pa min nyid sgrub//
analyzed: de la khyab pa min nyid sgrub//
translated: It is established as not pervaded.

original: gtan tshigs dngos med tsam yin na //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dngos med tsam yin na //
translated: If the reason is mere non-existence,

original: gang du ci zhig gang gis sgrub //
analyzed: gang du ci zhig gang gis sgrub //
translated: Where, what, and by what is it established?

original: med pa tsam de gtan tshigs yin //
analyzed: med pa tsam de gtan tshigs yin //
translated: That mere non-existence is the reason.

original: gang yang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gang yang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: Also, because there is no relation,

original: ci ltar bsgrub bya sgrub pa yin //
analyzed: ci ltar bsgrub bya sgrub pa yin //
translated: How is it established?

original: 'on te gsal ba gzhan dang 'brel pa dang bral ba yin na /
analyzed: 'on te gsal ba gzhan dang 'brel pa dang bral ba yin na /
translated: If, on the other hand, the individual is related or not related,

original: de'i tshe yang de gang yin zhes nges par brtag par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang de gang yin zhes nges par brtag par bya ba nyid do //
translated: Then at that time, what is it? It should be investigated.

original: de'i phyir nges pa gzhan gyis brjod pa'i spyi blo la gnas par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa gzhan gyis brjod pa'i spyi blo la gnas par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, by another ascertainment, the universal that is expressed will remain in the mind.

original: phyogs kyi chos nye bar bsdu ba med par ni gtan tshigs bsgrub bya bsgrub par byed nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nye bar bsdu ba med par ni gtan tshigs bsgrub bya bsgrub par byed nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Without the inclusion of the property of the position, the reason is not able to establish the probandum.

original: 'on te gzhan sel ba'i mtshan nyid kyi spyi bde bar gshegs pa las grub pa yin @138b no zhe na ;
analyzed: 'on te gzhan sel ba'i mtshan nyid kyi spyi bde bar gshegs pa las grub pa yin @138b no zhe na ;
translated: But if you say that the universal is established from the Sugata in terms of the characteristic of the exclusion of other,

original: de ltar gzhan gyi 'dod pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar gzhan gyi 'dod pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: then it would be just as others assert.

original: gzhan gyis khas blangs pa ni nyes kyang sun 'byung bar 'dod pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan gyis khas blangs pa ni nyes kyang sun 'byung bar 'dod pa nyid do //
translated: For others assert that even if there is a fault, it is acceptable to refute it.

original: gzhan yang gzhan sel ba'i mtshan nyid kyis spyi ni khyab pa nyid du 'dod pa kho na 'di ltar /
analyzed: gzhan yang gzhan sel ba'i mtshan nyid kyis spyi ni khyab pa nyid du 'dod pa kho na 'di ltar /
translated: Moreover, the universal characterized by the exclusion of other is asserted to be pervasive.üîΩBut it is not possible that

original: ldog par mtshungs pa nyid dag ni //
analyzed: ldog par mtshungs pa nyid dag ni //
translated: those that are similar in terms of exclusion

original: yod srid dngos po'i rjes 'gro med //
analyzed: yod srid dngos po'i rjes 'gro med //
translated: are pervasive, because they do not follow the entity.

original: 'jug pa la sogs bral 'gyur phyir //
analyzed: 'jug pa la sogs bral 'gyur phyir //
translated: Because they would be devoid of engagement and so on.

original: 'on te spyi yod pa ma yin pa la yang bral ba'i mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs ni yod pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te spyi yod pa ma yin pa la yang bral ba'i mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs ni yod pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that even though the universal does not exist, the reason characterized by exclusion does exist,

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: that is also not so.

original: med pa la ni gtan tshigs mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa la ni gtan tshigs mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a reason is not suitable for a nonexistent.

original: med pa sgrub pa la rung ba nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: med pa sgrub pa la rung ba nyid do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is suitable for the proof of a nonexistent,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: 'brel pa med na gcig med pas gzhan med par rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa med na gcig med pas gzhan med par rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: If there is no relation, then the absence of one thing is understood to be the absence of the other.

original: 'brel pa la rjes su 'gro ba la 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa la rjes su 'gro ba la 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: The apprehension of the pervasion is as follows:

original: des na de'i stobs kyis gang na khyab par byed pa med pa de na khyab par bya ba med pa yin no zhes mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa tsam zhig ston te /
analyzed: des na de'i stobs kyis gang na khyab par byed pa med pa de na khyab par bya ba med pa yin no zhes mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa tsam zhig ston te /
translated: By the power of that, where there is no pervader, there is no pervaded. Thus, it shows the mere absence of the discordant side,

original: rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: but not the root reason.

original: 'on te so sor nges pa'i dngos po'i yul med par sgrub pa'i phyir khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yang nye bar len to zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te so sor nges pa'i dngos po'i yul med par sgrub pa'i phyir khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yang nye bar len to zhe na /
translated: But if one accepts the non-observation of the pervader in order to prove the absence of a particular object,

original: de lta yin na /
analyzed: de lta yin na /
translated: then in that case,

original: 'di na gang shing sha pa med do zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis tshad mas grub pa'i chos can gzhan yod dgos so //
analyzed: 'di na gang shing sha pa med do zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis tshad mas grub pa'i chos can gzhan yod dgos so //
translated: there must be another property-possessor established by valid cognition, in the manner of saying, Here, there is no shasha·πÖka tree.

original: 'on te 'dir yang dngos po dang dngos po med pa thun mong ba'i chos can du len to zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te 'dir yang dngos po dang dngos po med pa thun mong ba'i chos can du len to zhe na /
translated: But if one accepts a property-possessor common to both existence and non-existence here,

original: de yang mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de yang mi 'thad de /
translated: that is also not tenable.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa thun mong ba gzhan pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa thun mong ba gzhan pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other common locus of entity and non-entity.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba nyid gnyi ga'i thun mong gi chos can yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba nyid gnyi ga'i thun mong gi chos can yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the appearance of conceptualization itself is the subject common to both,

original: de lta na ni 'on te dngos po nye bar len pa can ma yin par bsgrub pa la de dmigs pa gzhan gtan tshigs yin pa'i phyir de ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'on te dngos po nye bar len pa can ma yin par bsgrub pa la de dmigs pa gzhan gtan tshigs yin pa'i phyir de ni gyi na'o //
translated: then, in the proof of the non-apprehension of a thing that is not a basis of apprehension, it is not correct that the observation of that is the reason,

original: de'i phyir 'di rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs ni ma yin te /
translated: because that is not the fundamental reason.

original: spyi chos can grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi chos can grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no established subject, the universal.

original: gzugs la sogs pa nyid spyi yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs la ni /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa nyid spyi yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs la ni /
translated: In the position that form, etc. themselves are the universal,

original: 'di thal ba sgrub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di thal ba sgrub pa ma yin te /
translated: this is not a proof of a consequence,

original: de dag khyab pa nyid ma yin pa ni mngon sum gyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag khyab pa nyid ma yin pa ni mngon sum gyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the non-pervasiveness of those is understood by direct perception.

original: de'i phyir rgol ba gnyi ga la grub pa nyid gtan tshigs yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgol ba gnyi ga la grub pa nyid gtan tshigs yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the reason is established for both parties in the debate,

original: phyir rgol gcig pu la grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyir rgol gcig pu la grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but not just for one party.

original: gal te gang zhig gnyi ga la rab tu grub pa de ni don nyid yin pas don smos pa ci dgos she na /
analyzed: gal te gang zhig gnyi ga la rab tu grub pa de ni don nyid yin pas don smos pa ci dgos she na /
translated: If something is established for both, it is the meaning itself, so what is the point of stating the meaning?

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.üîΩBecause

original: gang gi phyir /üîΩci @139a * //üîΩltar gcig la rtogs tsam las //
analyzed: gang gi phyir / ci @139a * // ltar gcig la rtogs tsam las //
translated: howüîΩis it established for one through mere understanding,

original: grub bzhin gnyi ga la yang 'gyur //
analyzed: grub bzhin gnyi ga la yang 'gyur //
translated: but not for both?

original: gang phyir rtogs pa 'di dag ni //
analyzed: gang phyir rtogs pa 'di dag ni //
translated: Because these understandings

original: nges par skye dang 'brel ma yin //
analyzed: nges par skye dang 'brel ma yin //
translated: are not definitely related to arising.

original: des na phyogs dang mthun phyogs las gang gcig pu la grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na phyogs dang mthun phyogs las gang gcig pu la grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not established for just one of the two, the similar and dissimilar classes.

original: gal te gang zhig gnyi ga la don nyid ma yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te gang zhig gnyi ga la don nyid ma yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid ma yin no //
translated: If something is not the meaning for both, it is not a reason.

original: 'di ltar / don smos de ni sgra ngag dang // rtogs pas sgro btags bdag nyid can //
analyzed: 'di ltar / don smos de ni sgra ngag dang // rtogs pas sgro btags bdag nyid can //
translated: Thus, the statement of the meaning has the nature of being superimposed by words and understanding.

original: rtags nyid min par sgrub don te //
analyzed: rtags nyid min par sgrub don te //
translated: The purpose of establishing it as not a reason is
